## Chess.history() method

Returns a list containing the moves of the current game.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
history(options?: {
        verbose?: false;
    }): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { verbose?: false; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string\[\]

## Example


```js
const chess = new Chess()
chess.move('e4')
chess.move('e5')
chess.move('f4')
chess.move('exf4')

chess.history()
// -> ['e4', 'e5', 'f4', 'exf4']

```
